title: Cymate
detaileddescription: A graduation project developed for CIS Mansoura University. This comprehensive web application features advanced functionality built with modern technologies. The project demonstrates full-stack development skills with React.js frontend, Django backend for community space and user authentication, and Node.js services for the toolkit.

title: Denimora
detaileddescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built for a freelancing client. This project features a modern design, full shopping cart functionality, product management, and Bosta shipping integration. Built with React.js frontend and Django backend with RESTful API architecture.
features: Admin panel for stock and business management
notes: This project was developed for a freelancing client and now it is not the official site for denimora.

title: Web Portfolio
detaileddescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my development skills and projects. Built with React.js and styled with custom CSS, featuring smooth animations, responsive design, and clean user interface.

title: Investment Calculator
detaileddescription: A small React practice project (Udemy “React”) that calculates and displays yearly investment growth based on user inputs.
features: Live calculations as you change inputs

title: Project Management App
detaileddescription: A small React practice project (Udemy “React Course”) to create projects, view details, and manage tasks per project.
features: Create projects with title, description, and due date
Project sidebar to list and select projects
Project details view with formatted due date + description
Delete projects from the details view
Task management per project (add tasks + clear tasks)
Input validation modal for empty fields (React Portal via #modal-root)
Clean component structure (ProjectSideBar, NewProject, SelectedProject, Tasks, Modal)

title: Quiz App
detaileddescription: A small React practice project (Udemy “React Course”) to take a timed quiz, select answers, skip questions automatically on timeout, and see a final summary with a per-question review.
features: Timed questions with a progress bar
Auto-skip on timeout (records null as skipped)
Final results screen with total score and percentage
Per-question review with correct answer feedback

title: Food Ordering App
detaileddescription: A React practice project (Udemy “React Course”) to browse meals, add/remove items from a cart, and place an order via a simple backend API. Includes a checkout modal and order confirmation state.
features: Cart management (add, remove, clear) using Context + Reducer
Cart & Checkout shown as modals with UI state managed via context
Checkout form that submits orders to backend (POST /orders)
Basic HTTP handling with a reusable useHttp hook
